resources.string: Raman signal should be measured at the center of a culet. The "measured position" is the minimum of the Raman signal derivative
It is not a Raman signal from an anvil, it is a peak from a diamond inside the sample chamber

Pressure dependence of ruby shift is taken from:

Shen G., Wang Y., Dewaele A. et al. (2020) High Pres. Res. doi: 10.1080/08957959.2020.1791107

Mao H.K., Xu J., and Bell P.M. (1986) J. Geophys. Res. 91, 4673


 Temperature correction comes from:

Datchi F., Dewaele A., Loubeyre P., et al. (2007) High Press. Res. 27, No 4, 447-463

Calibration for Diamond anvil Raman comes from:

Akahama Y. and Kawamura H., J. Appl. Phys. 100, 043516 (2006).


 Calibration for Diamond Raman is taken from:

Dubrovinskaia N. et al., Appl. Phys. Lett. 97, 251903 (2010).
